sentences.sContent: Jake: Because almost everyone in Stamford used to work at the Yale factory.
sentences.sContent_eng: Jake: Because almost everyone in Stamford used to work at the Yale factory.
sentences.sCn: 杰克： 因为过去几乎每个斯坦福德人都在耶鲁锁厂工作过。

sentences.sContent: Detective Stone, you have to stop him. . . or we'll never see the Stamford Treaty again!
sentences.sContent_eng: Detective Stone, you have to stop him. . . or we'll never see the Stamford Treaty again!
sentences.sCn: 斯通侦探， 我们得去阻止他， 否则我们将再也见不到斯坦福德条约了！

sentences.sContent: We have a small New England farm here at the Stamford Museum and Nature Center. We have many types of farm animals here.
sentences.sContent_eng: We have a small New England farm here at the Stamford Museum and Nature Center. We have many types of farm animals here.
sentences.sCn: 在斯坦福德博物馆和自然中心这儿有一个新英格兰式小农场， 在这儿我们有许多种家畜。

trans.tranCn: 斯坦福德[美国康涅狄格州西南部城市]
